TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinkLabel/Link extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 控制項中的連結。

span.span: Represents a link within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別定義內連結的屬性控制項。The class defines the properties of a link within a control. 您可以使用這些屬性來提供資料給事件的控制項，來執行工作，當按一下控制項中的連結。You can use these properties to provide data to the event of the control to perform tasks when the link is clicked in the control. 屬性可讓您定義資訊的事件可以使用 顯示 Microsoft Internet Explorer 中的 URL，或開啟檔案。The property enables you to define information that the event can use to display a URL within Microsoft Internet Explorer or to open a file. 除了連結的屬性的相關資訊類別也會協助定義的文字和它的顯示狀態。In addition to information related to the link, the properties of the class also help define the text of the and its display state. 並屬性定義的位置和長度的文字中的文字控制項來顯示為連結。The and properties define the location and length of text from the text of the control to display as a link. 屬性可讓您將連結顯示為已停用的連結，而屬性可以警告使用者他們已瀏覽目前的執行個體中指定的連結。The property allows you to display the link as a disabled link, and the property can alert the user that they already visited the specified link in the current instance of the . 您可以顯示多個連結，在單一控制項。You can display multiple links in a single control. 每個就會加入至聯控制項。Each is added into the associated with the control. 若要取得集合中定義的連結控制，請使用屬性。To obtain the collection of links defined in a control, use the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別，具有多個定義，在表單上顯示標籤的區段。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 此範例示範如何設定， ， ， ，並屬性，以自訂的外觀。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一個指定使用屬性。The first is specified using the property. 其他連結新增到使用方法。Additional links are added to the using the method. 範例會處理藉由啟動 Web 瀏覽器的超連結，並顯示事件其他連結。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/CPP/linklabel.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/CS/linklabel.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/VB/linklabel.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來停用狀態內顯示連結控制項。You can use this property to display a link in a disabled state within the control. 停用連結時，按一下連結不會造成引發的控制項事件。When a link is disabled, clicking on the link does not cause the control to raise the event.

summary.span: 取得或設定連結文字的字元數。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of characters in the link text.

value.span: 連結文字中的字元數包含空格。

span.span: The number of characters, including spaces, in the link text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指定從文字若要顯示為連結，請設定屬性，以啟動 建立連結的文字中的位置。To specify text from the to display as a link, set the property to the location in the text to start creating the link. 在後屬性是設定，設定的值字元，包括在指定的字元位置數目的屬性屬性，您想要讓連結文字。After the property is set, set the value of the property to the number of characters, including the character position specified in the property, that you want to make the link text. 例如，如果您想要讓文字 「 quick brown fox 」 的第一個文字連結，您設定屬性設為零 (0) 和屬性三 （3)。For example, if you want to make the first word of the text "The quick brown fox" a link, you set the property to zero (0) and the property to three (3).

summary.span: 取得或設定與連結相關的資料。

span.span: Gets or sets the data associated with the link.
An representing the data associated with the link.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來提供連結的相關資訊。You can use this property to supply information related to the link. 這個屬性所提供的資訊可用於事件的提供可用來處理所按的連結，連結的相關資訊。The information provided by this property can be used within the event of the to provide information about the link that can be used to process the link being clicked. 比方說，您可以指定要顯示在 Internet Explorer 中，按一下連結的值時的 URL屬性。For example, you can specify the URL to display in Internet Explorer when the link is clicked as the value of the property. 您也可以使用屬性來識別當使用者按一下連結時要顯示的對話方塊。You can also use the property to identify a dialog to display when the user clicks on the link. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別，具有多個定義，在表單上顯示標籤的區段。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 此範例示範如何設定， ， ， ，並屬性，以自訂的外觀。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一個指定使用屬性。The first is specified using the property. 其他連結新增到使用方法。Additional links are added to the using the method. 範例會處理藉由啟動 Web 瀏覽器的超連結，並顯示事件其他連結。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指定從文字若要顯示為連結，請設定屬性，以啟動 建立連結的文字中的位置。To specify text from the to display as a link, set the property to the location in the text to start creating the link. 在後屬性是設定，設定的值字元，包括在指定的字元位置數目的屬性屬性，您想要讓連結文字。After the property is set, set the value of the property to the number of characters, including the character position specified in the property, that you want to make the link text. 例如，如果您想要讓文字 「 quick brown fox 」 的第一個文字連結，您設定屬性設為零 (0) 和屬性三 （3)。For example, if you want to make the first word of the text "The quick brown fox" a link, you set the property to zero (0) and the property to three (3).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Visited { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定數值，表示使用者是否瀏覽過該連結。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user has visited the link.

value.span: 如果瀏覽過該連結則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the link has been visited; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項並不會自動代表的已瀏覽的連結的連結。A control does not automatically denote that a link is a visited link. 若要將連結顯示為已瀏覽的連結，您可以設定此屬性的值`true`中的事件處理常式事件的。To display the link as a visited link, you can set the value of this property to `true` in an event handler for the event of a . 已瀏覽的連結會顯示使用中指定的色彩屬性控制項。A visited link is displayed using the color specified in the property of the control. 一次表單，其中包含控制項關閉時，所有連結相關聯的顯示狀態為已刪除。Once the form containing the control is closed, the all display state associated with the link is deleted. 若要保留連結的顯示狀態，您要將連結的顯示狀態儲存在您的應用程式相關聯的登錄設定。In order to retain the display state of the link, you need to store the display state of the link in a registry setting associated with your application. > [!NOTE] > 如果您有只有一個連結中指定控制項，您可以使用屬性至指定的連結，為已瀏覽。If you have only one link specified in a control, you can use the property of the to specify the link as visited. 您也可以使用屬性，如果您有多個連結定義，但設定僅適用於定義控制項中的第一個連結。You can also use the property if you have multiple links defined, but the setting only applies to the first link defined in the control. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別，具有多個定義，在表單上顯示標籤的區段。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 此範例示範如何設定， ， ， ，並屬性，以自訂的外觀。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一個指定使用屬性。The first is specified using the property. 其他連結新增到使用方法。Additional links are added to the using the method. 範例會處理藉由啟動 Web 瀏覽器的超連結，並顯示事件其他連結。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links.
